description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called SwipeDetector that detects directional swipe gestures (left, right, up, down) with configurable thresholds, velocity, and debounce behavior. It provides callbacks for swipe directions and manages gesture detection using Flutter's GestureDetector, with additional logic to handle thresholds and debounce timing.

classes.name: SwipeDetector
classes.description: A Flutter widget that detects swipe gestures in four directions with configurable thresholds and debounce behavior.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _SwipeDetectorState
methods.description: State class managing gesture detection, thresholds, debounce, and callbacks.

methods.name: _onStart
methods.description: Handles the gesture start event, noting initial position.

methods.name: _onUpdate
methods.description: Handles gesture move updates, determining swipe direction based on movement and thresholds.

methods.name: _onEnd
methods.description: Handles gesture end event, falling back on velocity to detect swipe if not already handled.
